Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.model

Class Budget

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.model.Budget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Budget extends Object implements Serializable
The class represents a budget for the account, and contains income, expenses and goals.
Since:
April 07, 2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ramtin Samavat, Stian Lyng
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Budget(String budgetId)
    The constructor creates a budget object with the given ID, initializing its balance to zero and creating empty lists of incomes, expenses, and goals.

  • Constructor Details

    • Budget

      public Budget(String budgetId) throws IllegalArgumentException, NullPointerException
      The constructor creates a budget object with the given ID, initializing its balance to zero and creating empty lists of incomes, expenses, and goals.
      Parameters:
      budgetId - the ID of the budget.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the budgetId is blank.
      NullPointerException - if the budgetId is null.
